website_summaries.verdict: Suffers the same wobbly chuck issue reported on other models, but warranty service is available. Multiple long-lasting batteries and good power make this set shine.
pros: Batteries (2) charge fast and last long
Charge indicator is a nice plus
Impact driver and hammer-drill have good power
Included tool bag is big enough to hold all accessories and extra drill bits
cons: Complaints about focus of LED light on driver
A few reports of defective batteries

customer_reviews.title: So awesome I bought another set!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tools. I bought my first set 5 years ago after working with a friend who had the same set. Even after dropping the driver 15ft. onto concrete a few times (not recommended) and using the drill to bore through ironwood until it started smoking (also not recommended) they kept on trucking. I just bought a second set for a big project coming up and I'm sure they'll both work marvelously. The batteries are also great so long as you don't let them sit for a year without charging them. Over all I'm learning to love Milwaukee tools even more then the DeWalts I used to use!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Walker

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are not what is pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures have 2 3Ah batteries but they are actually 1.5Ah. When I was finally able to use these after dealing with Amazon CS, I found the trigger for the impact driver was broken. It just came off in my hand. Driver still worked though. There was also an uncomfortable amount of sparks coming from the drill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are both great. The batteries have lasted me days
customer_reviews.text: These are both great. The batteries have lasted me days, and even when not in use they'll hold a good amount of charge for months. The bag is durable and certainly has room for other stuff besides just the drill, driver, charger, and batteries (I keep a big set of bits in there, too). I've mostly just used these on projects in wood around my apartment but I've yet to come across something that gives them any trouble. Having both the drill and driver is really convenient when working something that requires pre-drilling. I plan on buying other M18 tools when I have the budget.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best drill Ive owned
customer_reviews.text: This is second set of these Ive owned. I loved my old set so much I bought another. Ive used my first set extremely hard for 6 years and they still work perfect. I love the power of the hammer drill. bought this-second set with larger batteries and its nice to have the extra time they supply. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Tackspitter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Rugged, durable, tactile, comfortable, powerful, are all words that come to mind when using this product. This pair of quality drills are well worth the price, I strongly recommend them to anyone who is in need of a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: FreeRadical

customer_reviews.title: Never buy from the business again.
customer_reviews.text: Drills are good. Good quality tools. But the place I bought them from were jerks.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... have used this quite a lot and am very happy with life from the battery
customer_reviews.text: I have used this quite a lot and am very happy with life from the battery. You can trade them back and forth to keep on working while one charges. I have put some miles on the driver tool and never a problem. The set was one of my better investments. Drill will take up to a half inch drill bit. I do a lot of driver work making picnic tables so it get used a lot. I do not think its US made however.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Heselberg

customer_reviews.title: I have had these 4 years and the batteries are still working great. I have tried most of the big brands
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a cordless tool other than milwaukee again. I have had these 4 years and the batteries are still working great. I have tried most of the big brands, and always find myself standing in the store realizing that I can buy a brand new drill for not much more than they want for their replacement batteries that won't last more than a year, before I am replacing them again. Thank you Milwaukee for a quality battery operated tool!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: nice drill for home projects but not for contractors.
customer_reviews.text: I always liked Milwaukee products. But the handle and the side of this made out of plastic. But I think the most important downside of this product is, that here is no spot on the side to stop a bit. that means every time you have to carry a bit box with you. in my experiance most of the cheap drills come with a slot an a spare bit on the side. But over all it is good product look nice for around the house but i will not recommend it for construction.
customer_reviews.author: abdul mansoory

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set in 2011, still going strong with numerous projects taken care of. Way better than the yellow brand (batteries don't last). The run time with the xc batteries is great. Both tools have been well used and still work just as good as the day I got them. My set did come with the hammer drill handle that others said they didn't get. Impressed with how useful the impact driver is. It is my go to now for most projects. No complaints so far!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This drill set and price makes this deal the best on the market, in my time i have seen other brands out last milwaukee but its still the best option around when you consider paying tripple the price for a dewalt drill only and quality is almost the same, these drills are work horses,
customer_reviews.author: Straight

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Small Bag
customer_reviews.text: First off, the drills are great. No issues there. BUT, could you give me a drill bag that I can also add my bits & accessories? Not happy with the SMALL BAG. Fits the two (2) drills, charger, & batteries exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Osullivan

customer_reviews.title: awesome power and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used it very hard yet, but it's an outstanding deal for very good quality equipment. The best cordless drill I've ever used by far. I don't have a lot of experience with a cordless impact, but this one is awesome. Both tools are far stronger than I expected and I am confident that I could complete any one day project with power to spare. My only issue is that it was shipped in the Milwaukee package so not discreet at all. I would absolutely recommend this combo, or either tool individually. 👽
customer_reviews.author: Harold Horton Jr

customer_reviews.title: Buyiing Again, Use em Daily
customer_reviews.text: Good Tool at reasonable price. Very Satisfied, Previous kit has years of abuse, held up well and still going. Shipped quick to KY. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KY.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great value ... I bought this as a home warming gift for 1st time home owner.
customer_reviews.author: BrokenHill

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Everything was all there and works very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: These are real nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like these they feel sturdy and have plenty of power I chose these because Milwaukee has a good reputation and good reviews. Now I know why. I use them daily and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality and also really like the look as well. batteries last much longer than my older craftsman. powerful torque and good grip. the led light is also a nice touch. battery has button 2 show battery level so you know when u need to charge it. very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, durable tool.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a black and decker 14.4V drill. I can't believe how much of an upgrade this was. The features of the tool are exactly as described. Best feature about this particular tool is the Lithium Ion battery, it holds the charge for months without any loss of power and it works at full capacity until the battery is completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Kalicki

customer_reviews.title: Quality build
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of power tools and I am quite satisfied. They are quite hefty and solidly built. I feel like I can live with just the drill/driver more than the limited use impact driver. Batteries also last a long time and also feel very sold. No rattling noted after having it for nearly 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: L11

customer_reviews.title: Big Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Milwaukee as a replacement for a Dewalt drill that was 14 years old. WOW- the power and convenience of a hammer drill is overwhelming.I haven't had a chance to use the impact driver yet but it has to equal to the drill as far as power. I had previously purchased the 14 volt LiIon drill and really was impressed with it, so it was a given to go with this drill. The only thing I'm disappointed with the canvas bag instead of the hard case.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D. Calora

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic torque and battery life. Best set of tools in my garage.
customer_reviews.text: I use this set all the time, battery life is fantastic with plenty of power for any project. The bag is large enough for accessories and the torque on the drill driver is quite handy. Makes deck projects a snap with the impact tool.
customer_reviews.author: William Eid

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok I guess? I'm not a construction guy just do stuff around the house and apartment. I do see or experienced anything wrong with it. I used it to build 4 balconies and put up shelves in my closet and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: GDZLLA

customer_reviews.title: Best drills ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. We have used these drills non stop since then and truly are amazed at the great product! Very durable and long lasting batteries. We highly recommend this product to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Batteries charged quickly (within a hour for each) and my husband used them right away and loves them
customer_reviews.author: Nettiepants

customer_reviews.title: These are very good quality. They have a lot of power and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality. They have a lot of power and the batteries go on and on and on...amazing !
customer_reviews.author: dan olson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: First, I've never had an impact driver, so I have nothing to compare this set to. However, these do exactly what I want them to do. Despite being the "compact" model the hammer drill is great for doing concrete anchors. The impact driver is what really shines though. I've been installing sun sail shades on my house to create a nice shaded patio area. This involves putting 2X1/4" inch lag bolts into the side of my house. While I still drill a small pilot hole (so I don't split things), the impact driver puts them in like butter. My old drill couldn't even screw them in and I was having hand wrench them in before getting this tool.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Huss

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: Amazing units. Battery life lasts forever. These are no Ryobi's... man these things impact great, drill great, contractor grade. Clearly built for abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Christian John Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great price and does the job. Arrived on time. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik Bazula

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee is the best
customer_reviews.text: I'm still using this set, always love my Milwaukee tools. Can't go wrong buying Milwaukee tools, so much better than the "yellow brand tools".
customer_reviews.author: Handy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Lots of smiles and excitement when this was opened at ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of smiles and excitement when this was opened at Christmas! It was the model of choice on the wish list.
customer_reviews.author: Millslagle

customer_reviews.title: Love my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love my Milwaukee products. It's been nearly 2 years I think and both are still running strong, as well as the batteries. I would buy from these guys again anytime!!
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Long Battery Life and Great Power
customer_reviews.text: Technology only gets better and better. I've replaced my DeWalt with the Milwaukee. Both drills come in handy around the house.
customer_reviews.author: john markisz

customer_reviews.title: quiet and the battery charge indicator is a really nice feature.
customer_reviews.text: As a long time Dewalt user I finally took the plunge and only wish I had done it earlier. These drill/drivers are powerful, quiet and the battery charge indicator is a really nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Drill's chuck doesn't pass!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for the set with two batteries, but the cordless drill's chuck wasn't aligned. Had to contact Milwaukee fresh out of the box, because it holds bits crooked. Impact driver, charger and batteries seem to be fine for now, but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan M.

customer_reviews.title: ... me send whole kit back but luckily Milwaukee is awesome and replaced it under there warranty
customer_reviews.text: One battery was doa instead of replacing it they would only let me send whole kit back but luckily Milwaukee is awesome and replaced it under there warranty:) yeppy
customer_reviews.author: Joseph e souza

customer_reviews.title: I have two sets of 18v kits, plus a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two sets of 18v kits, plus a slew of 12v tools. Milwaukee has eclipsed Bosch and Makita for me
customer_reviews.author: jason samuels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fair Price, fast shipment, hopefully this will last as well as previous Milwaukee tools.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for concrete in my new unfinished basement I'm making into a woodshop
customer_reviews.author: Plane4848

customer_reviews.title: I love a great bargain
customer_reviews.text: What a steal! Would’ve paid $150 more at Home Depot. I love a great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Imlucky666

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived extremely fast and were exactly as advertised. Im VERY satisfied and would order again without a second thought!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. The charger is not charging one battery
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a hammer Drill capability and received a normal drill. Works fine. The charger is not charging one battery.
customer_reviews.author: ctvill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: some of my first milwaukee tools and not my last ,well made
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Shipped to Australia.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quick and saved quite a bit to AU prices. Arrived all safe and sound and as described. Just remember the charger is not the same power required and I blew it up, opps no sweat got one on ebay and all cool. Tools get a good work out and are preforming nicely. very happy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pod

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tools
customer_reviews.text: I had craftsman stuff before this and will never look back. Milwaukee is awesome and these tools are the best I've used. I have friends that swear by the yellow and blue brands, but I am a lifelong fan of RED now! UPDATE: May 2014 Tools are still going strong after plenty of use and abuse. They don't look as nice anymore, but they still perform like they did the day I received them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This product was much cheaper than most other stores. I won't be using it for a while, so I can't comment on battery life.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used them on a deck project. They work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Charge was no good right out of box husband had battery on charger ...
customer_reviews.text: Charge was no good right out of box husband had battery on charger over night and didn't charge took to work had on charger couple hours still didn't charge battery
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use on my next big project
customer_reviews.text: This tool kit was exactly as described. It arrived well ahead of the scheduled date. Not much use yet, but waiting for the next project to come along. Yes I would definetly purchase from "Tool King" again.
customer_reviews.author: D Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Having not used a impact driver before, I was in for a real surprise! This tool makes it much easier to drive screws! Not as much force is needed and your bits will last much longer. I love the LED light on both tools also. Lightweight and a joy to use! Best Christmas gift I ever bought myself!
customer_reviews.author: Myron S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: This combo has plenty of power and holds a charge forever! I've done 4 weekends worth of odd jobs off a single charge on both batteries. Impact has no problem laying down backerboard screws. The build quality is way higher then the low-mid range dewalt drills.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: good combo
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this combo. I already have several Milwaukee tools but the extra batteries and charger will come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: mikebehr

customer_reviews.title: Feature not as described.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was very fast However, in the description posted as "Features" indicated the country of origin was USA, yet they were not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: R Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great don't know how I would make it without it good power
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Talk about the perfect gift. We have had no problems with this product and my boyfriend loved the combo.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: great tools
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee tools are awesome, very happy so far. The shipping was very efficient, the tools were in great shape and working perfect at the moment
customer_reviews.author: moreliaroberti

customer_reviews.title: Millwaukee's best
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all with this combo..Nice balance, torque and great run time.Always having a battery in reserve is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Gibber

customer_reviews.title: Great tools!
customer_reviews.text: These tools are incredible. They are definitely not underpowered, like I thought they would be. The impact driver is wonderful for driving in wood screws. And the drill has plenty of power for all of your other needs. Good product!! Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: JennyfromtheBlock

customer_reviews.title: Great drills
customer_reviews.text: I work in construction I was worried about the size and the Power of the drill but I used it and it has no problem with power. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: andy vaughan

customer_reviews.title: best drills ive ever owns
customer_reviews.text: i have long been a milwaukee user, these drills perform very well when put to the tests of everyday torture, impact drill performs flawlessly and batteries last along time after being fully charged
customer_reviews.author: dhinkle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these to use on the job, they are exactly what we needed and expected. One of them we had to send back to get a replacment, but it was a fluke. The new one came quickly and works perfectly. The company was really easy to work with too for the return and new shipment. We are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 3

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee 2697-22 M18 18-Volt 1/2-Inch 2-Tool Combo Kit
customer_reviews.text: Amazing combo kit highly recommended better than my expectations to be honest. The only problem i had was the charger but that was my mistake so i had to buy a new EU charger.
customer_reviews.author: MR PAVLOS PAVLOU

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product came quick and it works great, couldn't have asked for anything different.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Drill & driver work good and batteries last long and charge fast.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the drills a lot , Iam going to keep buying from you .
customer_reviews.author: gilberto

customer_reviews.title: Review of Milwaukee's best!
customer_reviews.text: I had this same dcombo in the V18 style which was larger and heavier...but mot more powerful....I am again convinced Milwaukee owns the title for best battery powered tools. It is my favoriete of all mu battery powered tools and the I use it every day. I got it before the due date, it was e43xactly as decribed. AAI will order tools from them again....tom
customer_reviews.author: t seim

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this item to anyone else
customer_reviews.text: not the quality I though it would be! I would not recommend this item to anyone else! Ray Smith
customer_reviews.author: Ray Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bad news
customer_reviews.text: When it didn't work correctly they wouldn't give full credit for return.
customer_reviews.author: First Lewie

customer_reviews.title: Imact driver seemed to work fine but the drill malfunctioned right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Dewalt tools but on a pros recommendation I made the switch to Milwaukee for this purchase. Wrong. Imact driver seemed to work fine but the drill malfunctioned right out of the box. Packed it up and sent it back. Going back to dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: kevinsculpture

customer_reviews.title: dead Milwaukee impacts
customer_reviews.text: this was the third Milwaukee impact in two years no more Milwaukee cordless tools. Sad very sad Milwaukee should be the best of them all.
customer_reviews.author: sawman

customer_reviews.title: not the same thing as picture
customer_reviews.text: Please be advised that what you are looking at and what will be shipped to you are two different things! The hammer drill is NOT the heavy duty one and does NOT have the handle! I ordered this combo kit going by the picture and it's NOT the same hammer drill. I wrote to Amazon and they had UPS come to pick it up at my house and returned it at no cost to me. So as long as you know that this is the lighter duty hammer drill and doesn't come with the handle there is nothing wrong with it. Amazon needs to change their picture so others aren't deceived by it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kepple

customer_reviews.title: Mislead
customer_reviews.text: I would like to review this product but can't.....it seems that when I purchased this item it was advertised as new, but when it arrived it was reconditioned, when asking why it was reconditioned I was told that it was a mistake online. Hmmm...maybe they should have honored what they advertised
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Murello

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 2697-22 M18 18-Volt 1/2-Inch 2-Tool Combo Kit Includes Charger, Battery (2) and Bag
product_meta.description:
M18 Combo Hmr Drl W/1/4 Hex Imp Driver/2 Bat. The Product is Easy to Use and Easy to Handle. The Product is Highly Durable. Made In China.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Milwaukee 2697-22 is a two-tool combo kit that brings together the popular M18 1/2-inch hammer drill/driver and the M18 1/4-inch hex drive impact driver in one kit. This deal also comes with two high-capacity lithium-ion batteries, a charger, and a contractor's bag.
feature_bullets: M18 Combo hmr dr BL W/1/4 hex Imp driver/2 bat
The product is easy to use and easy to handle
M18 compact hammer drill's digital power management--overload protection prevents damage to tool and battery in abusive situations
M18 impact driver utilizes a 1/4-inch hex quick-change chuck for easy bit changes and a variable-speed trigger
Both tools use a built-in LED light to illuminate work surfaces
A 1/4-inch hex quick-change chuck allows for easy bit changes while a variable-speed trigger provides increased user control
The driver offers 0-3,200 IPM, providing more impacts for increased productivity

specifications.Included Components: Combo Packs, Power Tool Combo Packs, Pneumatics
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars209 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
